Title: DASH-001 UI Layout (App Router)
Description: Créer app/(dashboard)/layout.tsx + Providers; intégrer theming, auth guard, Toaster.

Title: DASH-002 Page Synthèse
Description: app/(dashboard)/dashboard/page.tsx : KPIs, next sessions, 5 tâches; skeleton loaders.

Title: DASH-003 Agenda
Description: app/(dashboard)/agenda/page.tsx : liste sessions, filtres, export ICS; actions book/cancel.

Title: DASH-005 Evaluations
Description: app/(dashboard)/evaluations/page.tsx : générer, déposer copie, voir corrections, feedback.

Title: DASH-008 RAG & Cours
Description: app/(dashboard)/cours/page.tsx + ressources/page.tsx : recherche RAG, cartes ressources, favoris.

Title: DASH-013 DB Core
Description: Créer tables nexus_app: students, progress, tasks, sessions, evaluations, epreuves_plan, resources, events, reports, entitlements + index.

Title: DASH-014 MV Summary
Description: Créer mv_dashboard_summary + job refresh; exposer via /dashboard/summary.

Title: DASH-015 Agents Planner/Coach
Description: Implémenter planner_service et coach_service (écritures tasks/plan + events).

Title: DASH-016 Agent Evaluator
Description: Génération et correction (OCR) + mise à jour progress/events.

Title: DASH-018 Sécurité FastAPI
Description: JWT/Session middleware; RBAC; scopes par route.

Title: DASH-019 Tests E2E
Description: Playwright: user flow synthèse → réserver → générer éval → déposer copie.
